ygData.subject: RE: [warriors_eq] Latest Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally I think the Skyfire sword is really underrated sword (10/22 and a few stats as well cant recall them off hand). If all 3 hit(3 waves of 56 each) its
ygData.messageBody:
Personally I think the Skyfire sword is really underrated sword (10/22 and a
few stats as well cant recall them off hand). If all 3 hit(3 waves of 56
each) its 164 points a proc and on my warrior I usually resist near all of
it. The aoe is very small and if your in a group w/o an enchanter there is
really no reason not to use it IMO(Unless you have better which isn't too
tough its not that good). But with Garu I can proc 7 to 10 times on a exp
mob. (10x 164= 1640dmg, not too bad). This is coming from a player who's
main is a 55 enchanter so I am suppose to hate aoe weapons. Does anyone
know of anyother AOE weapons with a halfway all right proc? I would love to
have one for my off hand as well as main for those times when no Enchanter
is around and for single pulls.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Wilbarg [mailto:slu@...]
Sent: Friday, March 02, 2001 5:11 PM
To: warriors_eq@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Latest Patch


Wow THE Kailyn? The same fellow from the old eq.stratics board? The
guy who discovered the STA/HP formula & the Agi/AC formulas? If so its
darn good to hear from you again. I learned alot of what I needed to
know about warrioring from that board.

I indeed was part of the great warrior sitout (I think the first
sitout). I remember Fitty, Ruatha & all the other Stratics guys egging
all the warriors on to particpate (things really were hard on early
warriors). I was laughing when over your story about bronze...I myself
did not get full bronze until lvl 24 (?) if I remember right. Heck I
used dual Mino Axes until lvl 18 (then had to get a combine long sword
to kill undead in Unrest).

BTW another great warrior weapon to add to the "uber" list you mentioned
is the bloodpoint 10/21 procs an 80 pt hp txf & is not lore (drops in
Howling Stones). I have 1 of these at the moment & with werwolf form
see 8-9 procs a fight. My goal in life (other than get to lvl 56 &
riposte) is to obtain another.

Good to hear from you bro

Flair Shieldrender
54 Champion
Fennin Ro
EQ addicted since 3/22/99




For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
